column1: #Text=Korra says : " There 's something I need to tell you both . "
#Text=Korra says : " I want to go back to Republic City . "
#Text=Korra says : " I know I 'm not a hundred percent yet , but I feel like I 've hit a wall .
#Text=" Korra says : " No , I want to go alone and have some time to clear my head .
